AoC Annual
Conference & Exhibition

15 - 17 November 2016, The ICC Birmingham

The AoC annual conference brings together the further education sector under one roof to learn, develop, influence, exchange information and network. The conference combines keynote speakers, plenary sessions and breakout sessions to inform and stimulate debate
